alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 2:11AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of St. John The Baptist, southern Ascension, St. James, northwestern St. Charles, southeastern Livingston, southern Iberville and Assumption Parishes through 315 AM CST... At 211 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pierre Part, or near Belle River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Reserve, Hahnville, Laplace, Gramercy, Lutcher, Sorrento, Killona, Montz, Edgard, South Vacherie, Paincourtville, Convent, North Vacherie, Garyville, Wallace, Taft, Belle Rose and Norco. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 183 and 209. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; Southern Livingston; St. Charles; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension
